qas.question: What lacking resource does Estonia depend on other countries for?
What type of energy production as many companies been investing in recent years?
What energy source has been increasing in Estonia?
What is total amount of energy production from wind power?

context: Estonia is a dependent country in the terms of <a0_0>energy<a0_0/> and energy production. In recent years many local and foreign companies have been investing in <a1_0>renewable energy sources<a1_0/>.[citation needed] The importance of <a2_0>wind power<a2_0/> has been increasing steadily in Estonia and currently the total amount of energy production from wind is <a3_0>nearly 60 MW<a3_0/> while at the same time roughly 399 MW worth of projects are currently being developed and more than 2800 MW worth of projects are being proposed in the Lake Peipus area and the coastal areas of Hiiumaa.
